title: Dawn
provenance_text:
Jean René Bazaine [1904-2001], Paris, France, until December 1952 [1]; Galerie Maeght, Paris, France [2]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1952.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was no. 16 in "The 1952 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Paintings" held at Carnegie Institute, October-December 1952. 
[2]. Galerie Maeght was the artist's agent. The museum purchased the painting from the International on December 11, 1952 and payment was acknowledged by the gallery on December 29, 1952 (see correspondence with the artist and gallery in curatorial file.)
